detaileddescription.para: Translate string to current locale using Qt.

memberdef.name: sighashOptions
memberdef.initializer: = { {"DEFAULT", SIGHASH_DEFAULT}, {"ALL", SIGHASH_ALL}, {"NONE", SIGHASH_NONE}, {"SINGLE", SIGHASH_SINGLE}, {"ALL|ANYONECANPAY", SIGHASH_ALL|SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY}, {"NONE|ANYONECANPAY", SIGHASH_NONE|SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY}, {"SINGLE|ANYONECANPAY", SIGHASH_SINGLE|SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY}, }
